reviewText: This is a really great collection! Although, I must admit, we really only watch the Jukebox DVD most of the time.  My daughter is obsessed with veggie tales songs and she's even starting to sing them herself at 18 months old. Even my husband and I enjoy them (in moderation.) I originally bought it for "The Silly Song Countdown", which I had seen before, but the jukebox DVD has more songs and you can program it to play your favorites or just choose random and it will play them all continuesly at random.  We do that most of the time because it's easy to just pop it and and have the DVD player remember were we last left off, rather than having to scroll through the whole list every single time.  "The End of Silliness" Dvd is pretty dumb, in my opinion, but I guess it probably helped in the production of some fun songs, I just don't like watching this one as much because Larry is all grumpy and depressed, and my daughter doesn't seem to like it much either.  The "Sing-a-Long" one is good,though it doesn't have as many songs as the jukebox of course.  I think it will be good when my daughter is a bit older and learning o read though.
Title: N/A

reviewerName: Kelli of I'd So Rather Be Reading
reviewText: This collection comes with four DVDs.  The Jukebox is my little one's favorite part, and worth the price of the set, in my opinion.  If you choose "random selections" on the Jukebox menu screen, you have hours of entertainment waiting for you.  I've bought this DVD collection twice now (my little one loves to destroy DVDs and sometimes I can't catch her in time) and would definitely buy it again.
summary: The Jukebox is worth the entire purchase price
Title: N/A

reviewText: Looking for silly song collections on DVD?  Then you've come to the right place.  This set collections all three silly song collections plus a new fourth disc.Disc one is the original.  "Very Silly Songs" collects music from their first few videos.  It includes words down at the bottom so you can sing along with such hits as "Dance of the Cucumber," "God is Bigger," "The Water Buffalo Song," and "The New, Improved Bunny Song."  Along the way, Larry introduces the first ever VeggieTales workout, home improvement, and success videos.  This is also our first meeting with "The Pirates who don't do Anything."Disc two is the second sing-a-long video.  "The End of Silliness!?!" finds Larry despondent in a diner mourning the loss of the "Silly Songs with Larry segments.  Along the way, we get to hear such classics as "Stuffmart Rap," "Cheeseburger Song," "Song of the Cebu," "and "Promised Land."The third disc in this set is "The Ultimate Silly Song Countdown."  The only part to be previously released on DVD, this show counts down the first ten silly songs according to fan votes.  What will be the number one song?The final disc is all new.  This disc is a silly song jukebox.  With 35 songs to choose from, you can select the songs and the order they play in.  Or you can let the machine choose at random.  Either way, sit back and relax to some silly music and video.  Included on this disc are classics from the first videos and new songs like "Hope's Song," "Sport Utility Vehicle," "Bellybutton Song," and "Schoolhouse Polka."Granted, the last two discs have lots of overlap from the first two.  But depending on what you want to see, it's not that bad.  And for the price per disc, you really can't complain.  The only song collection missing is one they released to promote Jonah.Each of the first three discs have audio commentaries, behind the scenes interviews, games, how to draw segments, and more fun.If you love your veggie songs, silly and other wise, this set is for you.  You'll be singing and laughing for hours at the silliness while learning some Biblical truths in the process.
summary: All the Silliness You Can Handle

reviewText: Hey, what else will they come up with? Hey, I gotta tell you, my daughter, as well as my wife and I, are pretty big fans of "Silly Songs with Larry: The part of the show where Larry comes out and sings... a silly song." Consider this 4 DVD box set a collection. It comes with special features and everything! So if you want to know about how they came up with "Song of the Cebu", there's a story behind it! I mentioned there are 4 DVDs. They will be listed below.Very Silly Songs!: Consider this for what the title reads, ok? And consider that Larry will be quite Larry-like... meaning Larry will be his regular silly self, and then some! Lots of good stuff on this, and PLENTY of songs to keep the goofiness going for quite some time.The End of Silliness!?!: Can you believe it when you read the terrible title?! NNNNNNNNOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!! Is Archibald Aspargagus really attempting to take away Larry's silly songs? What's the deal with that "Cheeseburger" song anyway? Oh boy! Poor Larry, he really doesn't look too good in that diner. But just so you know, there ARE some silly songs. This has the breath-taking ending, and to a kid, it'll leave their little hearts pounding for hours to come!The Ultimate Silly Song Countdown: Here we have 3 special hosts from #10 to #1 in Silly Songs! We got this for Riley when she was only a few months old, NOW WE'RE ALL FANATICS FOR VEGGIE TALES!!!!! This is a lot of fun, and you'll be sure to watch it over and over.Veg-O-Rama Jukebox: This is new and basically gives you and your special kiddo the choice of what songs they want to watch. Some might think this a little time consuming, so it probably isn't for everyone, but it comes with the package. We had a lot of fun with it.I feel that the purpose of Silly Songs for EVERYBODY is this. You never get too old to have a little bit of fun from time to time. When you read in The Bible what Jesus had to say concerning children, then you MIGHT just say that these Silly Songs have a purpose! This is a great time. Have fun with it! God bless!
summary: Gotta love those silly songs! Lots and lots of fun!!!
